itunes:title: Episode 863 - The Scout Mindset
title: Episode 863 - The Scout Mindset
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Julia Galef, author of the book “The Scout Mindset”, to talk about how and why people get so defensive and refuse to admit they’re wrong. Julia explains what the ‘Scout Mindset’ means in relation to exploring...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson and Dan Hollaway are joined by Julia Galef, author of the book “The Scout Mindset”, to talk about how and why people get so defensive and refuse to admit they’re wrong. Julia explains what the ‘Scout Mindset’ means in relation to exploring your own beliefs and biases, and how that relates to stuff like understanding modern journalism and scientific data.
